name: meldgraphics
description: We design and develop graphical products and brands

scripts.meldgraphics: npm install -g gulp-cli bower tsd typescript parallelshell copyfiles && npm install && bower install && tsd install
scripts.build-dev: gulp clean && copyfiles -f ./src/video/* ./app/video && copyfiles -f ./src/fonts/* ./app/fonts && gulp dev:scripts dev:styles dev:html && gulp base64
scripts.build-prod: gulp clean && copyfiles -f ./src/video/* ./app/video && copyfiles -f ./src/fonts/* ./app/fonts && gulp prod:scripts prod:styles prod:html && gulp base64
scripts.production: npm run build-prod && npm run serve

author: Siarhei Savitski
